## BodyParameterMiddleware class

Middleware that is used for adding body to request

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class BodyParameterMiddleware implements RestMiddleware 
```
<b>Implements:</b> [RestMiddleware](./rest.restmiddleware.md)

|  --- | --- | --- |
